column6: This is it, the climactic battle you've been waiting for! They've been pushed, beaten, and nearly killed-now Hawkeye & Mockingbird face off against their personal arch-nemesis, Crossfire and the all-new Phantom Rider, in no-holds barred combat!
column8: | colorist:Nathan Fairbairn | penciller:David Lopez Lopez | penciller:Paul Renaud | writer:Jim McCann | letterer:Cory Petit
